rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A traditional Kerala-style entry with carved wooden doors and stone floor finish. Serves as a transitional space from the exterior to the interior.

rooms.name: Living Room/Dining Area
rooms.description: Open plan living area with traditional Kerala woodwork and stone flooring. Includes seating arrangement for dining, designed in alignment with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-ventilated kitchen with a central island. Traditional Kerala style fixtures and local materials are used. Designed with adequate space for traditional cooking methods.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet study/library area adorned with wooden bookshelves, natural light, and Kerala style motifs. The room respects Vastu guidelines for intellectual activities.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom featuring traditional Kerala ceiling designs and natural ventilation. Adheres to Vastu principles ensuring a restful atmosphere.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with minimalistic Kerala style decor and traditional elements. Incorporates Vastu guidelines for privacy and harmony.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-equipped bathroom adjoining the master bedroom, incorporating natural stone finishes in line with Kerala aesthetics. Designed to be functional yet aesthetically pleasing.

openings.description: Carved wooden doors typical of Kerala architecture, ensuring security and aesthetic appeal.
Traditional window designs with stone frames and natural ventilation openings.
